profile:
Absolutely Spotless Cleaning was founded by Jennifer Bell in 2007. Having trained as a professional house cleaner for 5 years prior to opening Absolutely Spotless, she now proudly offers over 18 years experience in cleaning homes and apartments/condos of all sizes. Our commitment to customer service is evident by the number of our many satisfied customers throughout the Durham Region and Burlington/Oakville region and references and reviews of our services are available.

We offer professional, detailed cleaning of the highest standard. One time, regular, occasional, move-in/out cleans, post renovation cleans available. Partial cleans available. Insured and bonded for your protection. Servicing all of Durham Region and surrounding areas, as well as Hamilton, Burlington, Oakville, Ancaster, Brantford and all surrounding areas. 

Absolutely Spotless Cleaning is registered and carries business insurance for your peace of mind and protection. Employees are covered by WSIB and government employee taxes are remitted.

We are social:

https://www.facebook.com/absolutelyspotless1
service_area:
Durham Region (Newcastle, Bowmanville, Oshawa, Whitby, Ajax, Pickering, Claremont, Port Perry, Seagrave, Solina, Hampton, Kinsale, Greenwood and all surrounding areas).

Now serving Scarborough and Markham.
